description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) and condition 6 (Materials) attached to planning permission reference 190208 granted 1/2/21 to allow for amendments to the layout of the approved scheme, including the increase size of core/communal area, single storey rear extension and addition of bay window to create 3 bedroom self-contained unit at ground floor.Â  Extension of front elevation external wall, creation of dedicated refuse area. Additional storey to form 1 bedroom on third floor and amenity. Omission of winter garden glazing, replacement with black steel railing and reduction in size to same proportion of ground floor window. Reduction in size of core windows on rear elevation and window colour change to grey.
